About the Artist

Wisamun Sitthiket

A renowned avant-garde photographer from Thailand

Wisamunmuang Sitthiket was born in Nakornsawan and graduated from The College of Fine Arts in Bangkok in 1979. His work has appeared in numerous magazines including, Model Magazine, Cute Magazine and Max Magazine. In 2007 Sitthiket, a freelance photographer and owner of Wisamun Studio launched Wisamun Workshop where he teaches in unique nude photography classes.
